assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Al Moammar Information Systems Company provides information technology solutions and services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It offers software-defined and converged storage; server infrastructure management, racks and power infrastructure, racks and tower servers, mission-critical, BladeSystem, and Hyperscale servers; and mobility, autonomy portfolio, big data and analytics, automation and cloud, app and desktop virtualization, application lifecycle management, data center and cloud management, desktop virtualization and mobile computing, and data center virtualization and cloud infrastructure softwares. The company also provides networks and communication solutions based on SDN, NFV, automation, and management and orchestration technologies; MIS solutions comprising geographical information services, oracle solutions, GIS based solutions, e-government and e-services solutions, hospital information systems, and asset management solutions; mainframe cost optimization, performance monitoring, remote support solutions, network management solution, IT business and service management, cloud computing, and management solutions, as well as data center automation and infrastructure, and capacity management solutions; and operation and maintenance services. In addition, it offers database security and compliance; digital IDs and signature, and PKI; multi factor authentication; smart cards and USB tokens; secure email/messaging; data leakage prevention; password auto repository; secure web portals; firewalls; governance, risk, and compliance management; electronic fund/data transfer security; vulnerability management solutions; virus and SPAM management systems; fraud detection and management; enterprise database encryption; identity and access management; gateway security solutions; and host and network IDS/IPS. The company was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
